original: ORRJE, Alfred Tage, Civilingenjör, Stockholm, f Piteå Idsförsaml 3/8 09 av banmäst A G Eriksson o Maria Domeij, gm Svea Holmberg. Studex Upps 29, KTH (V o V) 29—34. Arb.led o konstr v AB Arkitekt- & Byggn.-byrån i Sthlm 34, ing.bitr v Lantbr.styr :s kulturtekn byrå i Sthlm samt assist h stat lantbr.ing i Sthlms län 34—36, stat lantbr.-stip 36—38, ing.bitr v Kristianstads stadsing. -kont 37—38, l :e assist v KTH :s vattenb.inst 38, ing.bitr v Väg- o Vattenbyggn.styr :s hamn-byrå i Sthlm 38—39, rm konsult ing v Allm Ing.byrån H G Torulf i Sthlm. Resor: Norge 27, Danm 37 o 39. Av trycket: Avloppsledningar f landsortssamhällen (Landskomm Tidskr 40), Reningsfrågor betr avloppsvatten fr små bostadsområden (Nord Hyg Tidskr 40), Ekonomisk dimensionering av rörledningar f bevattn.anläggn (41), kurs i sanitär vatten-tekn f NKI.
translated: ORRJE, Alfred Tage, Civil Engineer, Stockholm, b. Piteå Rural Parish 3/8 09 to trackmaster A G Eriksson and Maria Domeij, m. Svea Holmberg. Graduated from Uppsala 29, Royal Institute of Technology (V and V) 29—34. Worked as project manager and designer at Architectural & Construction Office in Stockholm 34, assistant engineer at the Cultural Technology Bureau of the National Board of Agriculture in Stockholm, and assistant at the State Agricultural Engineering in Stockholm County 34—36, recipient of State Agricultural Engineering Scholarship 36—38, assistant engineer at the Kristianstad Municipal Engineering Office 37—38, first assistant at the Royal Institute of Technology's Water Institute 38, assistant engineer at the Port Bureau of the Road and Water Building Authority in Stockholm 38—39, consulting engineer at the Engineering Office H G Torulf in Stockholm. Traveled to Norway in 27, Denmark in 37 and 39. Publications: Sewerage systems for rural communities (Landskommun Tidskr 40), Treatment issues concerning sewage water from small residential areas (Nordic Hygiene Journal 40), Economic sizing of piping systems for irrigation facilities (41), course in sanitary water technology by NCI.
